message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I think you'd be very interested in. It's worth a lot to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I am very interested, but I can only afford to pay up to $8000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and I understand your budget.  While $8000 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down a bit to $9000 to make this work for both of us. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I still can't go above $8000 for the product. Would it be possible to meet at this price?
